attributes.action: Introduce ID cards as soon as possible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are tired of paying taxes to support people who have no right even to be here and a solid identification system will go some way towards ensuring our money only gets spent on those who are entitled to it.

We petition the government to make the introduction of such an ID system their number 1 priority.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
